roleset.name: giving legal rights to property

example.name: MNR
example.text: It was n't really a wedding , as they had n't been able to get the proper licensing , so they got married at City Hall earlier in the week and just re-enacted it for the reception .

example.name: all args
example.text: Williams sued Defendant for copyright infringment and other claims, alleging his licensing the song to third parties violated her rights.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, license.01. Correspons to VNcls patent-101.
